page.title: 03FARMING - ANIMAL HUSBANDRY
page.content:
There are several{dairy herds}in the area, mainly Friesian cows. The grassland is also used to graze{beef {cattle and sheep.} The majority of live stock sales take place at nearby {Uttoxeter market.
During the{winter months}the cattle are kept in large buildings and fed on the silage and hay produced from the local pastures in summer. Sheep are kept outside all year round.
An intensive{pig}production unit is situated within the area, one farm rears{mink,}and several small holders keep{goats.}
Many farmers have{horses,}kept for recreational purposes.
